ValidationRule.description: Must have one of the presented phone numbers filled in, AND email address
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( AND( ISBLANK( Phone ), ISBLANK( PersonAssistantPhone ), ISBLANK( PersonHomePhone ), ISBLANK( PersonMobilePhone ), ISBLANK( PersonOtherPhone ) ), ISBLANK( PersonEmail ), IsPersonAccount, !$Setup.Bypass__c.Validation__c, LOWER($Setup.Bypass__c.SObject__c) <> "all", LOWER($Setup.Bypass__c.SObject__c) <> "account" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: A Phone Number or Email Address is required to create a new patient
